body:
Don't forget the --no-clean on the end. 



> On 22 Dec 2014, at 12:51, Bryan Turley <notifications@github.com> wrote:
> 
> I have this in my notes, it may help you.
> Your CC_FOR_TARGET may be different, it should be the ndk's gcc.
> 
> CC_FOR_TARGET=arm-linux-androideabi-gcc GOOS=android GOARCH=arm GOARM=7 ./make.bash
> That is the make.bash in go/src/ and a "standalone toolchain" read the ndk docs for that bit.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub.
>
